mapper.select: select b.board_id as board_id, title, writer, regdate, hit, count(c.comment_id) as cnt from board b left outer join comment c on b.board_id=c.board_id group by title, writer, regdate, hit order by board_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, writer, content) values(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, content=#{content} where board_id=#{board_id}
